title: (x) Zaïre 74 - custom-designed logo {Patricia}
content:
“Zaïre 74” by Garland Lyn  
Does anyone could id this font?

 [‹ (x) Happy (type)face - FF Rian's Dingbats {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012182629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12942 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) German Cookbook: Die Küche Indonesiens - ITC Veljovic, Post Mediaeval {Stephen, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012182629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12877 "Go to next forum topic")
author: manukball

comments.content: This looks like a hand-drawn logo to me, not a font.
It wouldn’t surprise me this turns out to be a hand lettered logo.
I’d agree. Guessing that the 74 indicates the year, this is most likely hand lettered or even handcut in rubylith.
